info.title: Amazon EC2 VPC Peering Connections (Amazon VPC) API
info.description: The API for management VPC Peering Connections (Amazon VPC)

get.summary: Accept a VPC peering connection request.
get.description: Accept a VPC peering connection request.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,       and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.       Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: VpcPeeringConnectionId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC peering connection.

get.summary: Requests a VPC peering connection between two VPCs: a requester VPC that you own and a peern      VPC with which to create the connection.
get.description: Requests a VPC peering connection between two VPCs: a requester VPC that you own and a peern      VPC with which to create the connection.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,       and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.       Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: PeerOwnerId
parameters.description: The AWS account ID of the owner of the peer VPC.

parameters.name: PeerVpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC with which you are creating the VPC peering connection.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the requester VPC.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,       and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.       Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: VpcPeeringConnectionId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC peering connection.

get.summary: Describes one or more of your VPC peering connections.
get.description: Describes one or more of your VPC peering connections.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,       and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.       Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: VpcPeeringConnectionId.N
parameters.description: One or more VPC peering connection IDs.

get.summary: Rejects a VPC peering connection request.
get.description: Rejects a VPC peering connection request.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,       and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.       Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: VpcPeeringConnectionId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC peering connection.
